homebuyR 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Plot Affordable Home Price vs. Annual Interest Rate

    plot_price_vs_rate.Rd

    Creates an interactive line plot showing the estimated maximum affordable home price across a range of annual interest rates for a fixed monthly budget and down payment.

    plot_price_vs_rate(
  monthly_housing_budget,
  monthly_non_mortgage_costs,
  mortgage_term_months,
  prop_tax_rate_annual,
  pmi_rate_annual = 0.5,
  pmi_threshold_pct = 20,
  down_payment_input,
  rate_pct_range = seq(3, 10, by = 0.25)
)

    Arguments

    monthly_housing_budget

    Numeric. Total monthly housing budget.

    monthly_non_mortgage_costs

    Numeric. Non-mortgage, non-tax costs per month.

    mortgage_term_months

    Integer. Loan term in months.

    prop_tax_rate_annual

    Numeric. Annual property tax rate (percentage).

    pmi_rate_annual

    Numeric. Annual PMI rate (percentage).

    pmi_threshold_pct

    Numeric. Down payment threshold for PMI (percentage).

    down_payment_input

    List containing either `pct = value` or `dollars = value`. Example: `list(pct = 20)` or `list(dollars = 50000)`.

    rate_pct_range

    Numeric vector. Range of annual interest rates (percentage) to plot (e.g., `seq(3, 10, by = 0.25)`).

    Value

    A ggiraph object.

    Contents

    Developed by Nate Delaney-Busch.
